actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 15 of title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of pension of $125 per month to World War I veterans, subject to a $2,400 and $3,600 annual income limitation; to provide that retirement income such as social security shall not be counted as income; to provide that such pension shall be increased by 10 per centum where the veteran served overseas during World War I; and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment of $125 per month as a pension to World War I veterans, subject to a $2,400 and $3,600 annual income limitation. Provides that retirement income such as social security shall not be counted as income in the determination of annual income for purposes of pensions under this Act. Provides that such pension shall be increased by 10 percent where the veteran served overseas during World War I.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 15 of title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of pension of $125 per month to World War I veterans, subject to a $2,400 and $3,600 annual income limitation; to provide that retirement income such as social security shall not be counted as income; to provide that such pension shall be increased by 10 per centum where the veteran served overseas during World War I; and for other purposes.
